Header: Fisheries ministers Amaraweera and Weda Arachchi not satisfied about each other
Content: Minister of Fisheries Mahinda Amaraweera has said that he does not trust state Minister of Fisheris Dileep Weda-arachchi. The statement was in response to a recent comment made by State Minister Weda-arachchi where he said he felt he had not been given enough authority to carry his role effectively. Minister Amaraweera stated that the state Minister should be trustworthy to hand over a task.
